title: MOTION (SOTO-MARTINEZ for RAMAN – PADILLA) relative to funding for a Master Plan for the South Griffith Park Plan Area.

appearances.section: Items for which Public Hearings Have Not Been Held - (10 Votes Required for Consideration)
appearances.recommendation: TRANSFER and APPROPRIATE $300,000 as follows: $150,000 from the Council District Four (CD 4) Council Projects line item in the General City Purposes Fund No. 100/56, Account No. 000A28 and $150,000 from the AB 1290 Fund No. 53P, Account No. 281204 (CD 4 Redevelopment Projects - Services) to Department of Recreation and Parks Fund No. 302/89, Account No. 89270K (sub account name: South Griffith Park Master Plan). AUTHORIZE the Department of Recreation and Parks to make any corrections, clarifications or revisions to the above fund transfer instructions, including any new instructions, in order to effectuate the intent of this Motion, and including any corrections and changes to fund or account numbers; said corrections / clarifications / changes may be made orally, electronically or by any other means. Motion (Soto-Martinez - Padilla) dated 11-07-25
